assessments.status_rationale: No Eurostat flash HICP for September 2025 has been released yet; release due 2025-09-30. Today's articles focus on U.S. CPI, not euro area inflation.
The University of Michigan prelim inflation expectations for September 2025 are scheduled for 2025-09-13; no result reported in today's news.
Though headlines mention a record day for indexes, there is no confirmation that the S&P 500 closed at or above 5650; the deadline is 2025-10-15.
No evidence provided about VIX futures term structure or two consecutive days of backwardation. Deadline 2025-10-31.
No data on the U.S. 2y/10y Treasury spread reaching 0.00% or higher. Deadline 2025-10-31.
No Brent front-month settlement levels cited; threshold $96 not referenced. Deadline 2025-11-30.
No USD/CNH closing levels mentioned; threshold 7.50 not referenced. Deadline 2025-11-30.
Crypto news (Gemini IPO) does not provide ETH price levels; no confirmation of $3,300 breach. Deadline 2025-10-31.
No reporting on EU ETS EUA Dec-2025 settlement prices; €67 threshold unverified. Deadline 2025-10-31.
No OFAC action today explicitly naming Hezbollah; only UN Security Council criticism noted. Deadline 2025-10-31.
No LBMA Silver PM fixing cited; $35 threshold not referenced. Deadline 2025-10-31.
